front.title: AES-GCM Authenticated Encryption in Secure RTP (SRTP)

abstract.t: This document defines how the AES-GCM Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data family of algorithms can be used to provide confidentiality and data authentication in the SRTP protocol. Note: this is an intermediate draft, awaiting the inclusion of test vectors. Care is being taken to ensure these test vectors will be correct, always a desirable property.
